ELEVATE YOUR CAREER GROWTH BY JOINING TRANSFORM CHALHOUB

Transform Chalhoub is set to revolutionize our operations by introducing innovative end-to-end business processes and state-of-the-art systems like SAP and Blue Yonder with dynamic opportunities for you to be part of it.

Hear from your colleagues who participated in previous transformations! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f58854%252fare-you-ready-to-transform-chalhoub%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWdrE8eBZvTpd9W%252fRyKlrcadIZPk%252bdalHnrruQjA%252boUqxDFjrxmyRzEUuKsgO%252fNYWS8XJlxN%252b8zaYBRDWI3MrB9e8fekoY98RyTsPtQNbCbeWCzK9Q%252fEiwEMz2CVYpNqFCOB7BCNZ1w%252blBIKbjxXRckR5DQ8mIhohgDkGSRud1ReCkkPdphzaOjKM6PnwJ0kfusaZO5rEzTS3KioUoVl46pe%252fEUs%252fk9bdDjqUcWTYW4XS&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C339cf14163714a2aeff408dce45a20c9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638636322961311680%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=9bFwVWe1joPrOYRjn6Sjx0rDJJPaTGXAasss%2BOvDYK8%3D&reserved=0>

<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/0jFmzZHGKEqGJOEPFWrOgg/550456/9CA7A7A2C6289A9F9F08C585FF9B1FFE/untitled-design-2024-10-03t220842-620.png> 	
Romina Barrero joins our Group as Senior Design Manager, reporting directly to Gilbert Boustany.

Romi specialises in Design and Construction Management, with experience working for major retail brands in Latin America. In her new role, she will be part of the 3D Design Team that brings our stores to life, providing strategic leadership, value and support to the team. Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f58968%252fwelcoming-romina-barrero-elisa-lipira-to-the-group%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWdrE8eBZvTpd9W%252fRyKlrcadIZPk%252bdalHnrruQjA%252boUqxDFjrxmyRzEUuKsgO%252fNYWS8XJlxN%252b8zaYBRDWI3MrB9e8fekoY98RyTsPtQNbCbeWCzK9Q%252fEiwEMz2CVYpNqFCOB7BCNZ1w%252blBIKbjxXRckR5DQ8mIhohgDkGSRud1ReCkkPdphzaOjKM6PnwJ0kfusaZO5rEzTS3KioUoVl46pe%252fEUs%252fk9bdDjqUcWTYW4XS&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C339cf14163714a2aeff408dce45a20c9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638636322961338456%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=EN2IImlBVLjyfvwRHzZo4m4Z5ucfjiR1aFIxVD8GCIs%3D&reserved=0> 

Elisa LiPira joins our Group as a Design Manager, reporting directly to Imad Salloum.

chunks.text:
Elisa LiPira joins our Group as a Design Manager, reporting directly to Imad Salloum.

With over ten years of experience in leading design teams and delivering award-winning projects, Elisa brings a wealth of knowledge to her new position. In her role, she will focus on design management, ensuring the successful delivery of high-end projects within the Group.
Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f58968%252fwelcoming-romina-barrero-elisa-lipira-to-the-group%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWdrE8eBZvTpd9W%252fRyKlrcadIZPk%252bdalHnrruQjA%252boUqxDFjrxmyRzEUuKsgO%252fNYWS8XJlxN%252b8zaYBRDWI3MrB9e8fekoY98RyTsPtQNbCbeWCzK9Q%252fEiwEMz2CVYpNqFCOB7BCNZ1w%252blBIKbjxXRckR5DQ8mIhohgDkGSRud1ReCkkPdphzaOjKM6PnwJ0kfusaZO5rEzTS3KioUoVl46pe%252fEUs%252fk9bdDjqUcWTYW4XS&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C339cf14163714a2aeff408dce45a20c9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638636322961358951%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=U26KA6DYij3T2kLDPFRL3uFd5uL4WDianBwR%2BYUzS0s%3D&reserved=0>

chunks.text:
LAUNCH OF OUR NEW PASSWORD RESEST PORTAL THIS MONDAY

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/0jFmzZHGKEqGJOEPFWrOgg/550315/C02EFDB7E555383D2EAB7BA98B219E76/password-reset-portal.png> 	
To create a more efficient and secure way to manage your passwords, we are introducing a new password reset tool. This tool allows you to change your password directly through a user-friendly Password Reset Portal. 

What does this mean? Starting Monday, 7th October, when accessing Microsoft Outlook, you will be asked to register for Self Service Password Reset (SSPR). We ask you to choose Next and then Done to register.

Once completed you can access our new Password Reset Portal with advanced security features to ensure your account remains protected. We encourage all of you to use this service to enjoy a quick and seamless password reset experience. You can follow our guide here on how to get started!

For inquiries, please get in touch with us at Internal.Communications@chalhoub.com and to share your news in the Internal News please contact Yasmine.Uthman@chalhoub.com

Copyright © 2024 Chalhoub Group, all rights reserved.

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group.
